p: Hierarchical clustering was performed using Genesis software ( http://www.genome.tugraz.at/genesisclient/genesisclient_description.shtml). Ingenuity Pathway Analysis (IPA) was used for pathway analysis (Ingenuity Systems, http://www.ingenuity.com). In brief, Ingenuity uses Fisherâ€™s exact test to calculate the probability that a set of proteins is associated to a pathway by chance. P-values <0.05 were taken as significant.
